00072 /* *************** Armature Drawing - Coloring API ***************************** */
00073 
00074 /* global here is reset before drawing each bone */
00075 static ThemeWireColor *bcolor = NULL;
00076 
00077 /* values of colCode for set_pchan_glcolor */
00078 enum {
00079     PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL  = 0,        /* normal drawing */
00080     PCHAN_COLOR_SOLID,              /* specific case where "solid" color is needed */
00081     PCHAN_COLOR_CONSTS,             /* "constraint" colors (which may/may-not be suppressed) */
00082 
00083     PCHAN_COLOR_SPHEREBONE_BASE,    /* for the 'stick' of sphere (envelope) bones */
00084     PCHAN_COLOR_SPHEREBONE_END,     /* for the ends of sphere (envelope) bones */
00085     PCHAN_COLOR_LINEBONE            /* for the middle of line-bones */
00086 };
00087 
00088 /* This function sets the color-set for coloring a certain bone */
00089 static void set_pchan_colorset(Object *ob, bPoseChannel *pchan)
00090 {
00091     bPose *pose = (ob) ? ob->pose : NULL;
00092     bArmature *arm = (ob) ? ob->data : NULL;
00093     bActionGroup *grp = NULL;
00094     short color_index = 0;
00095     
00096     /* sanity check */
00097     if (ELEM4(NULL, ob, arm, pose, pchan)) {
00098         bcolor = NULL;
00099         return;
00100     }
00101     
00102     /* only try to set custom color if enabled for armature */
00103     if (arm->flag & ARM_COL_CUSTOM) {   
00104         /* currently, a bone can only use a custom color set if it's group (if it has one),
00105          * has been set to use one
00106          */
00107         if (pchan->agrp_index) {
00108             grp = (bActionGroup *)BLI_findlink(&pose->agroups, (pchan->agrp_index - 1));
00109             if (grp)
00110                 color_index = grp->customCol;
00111         }
00112     }
00113     
00114     /* bcolor is a pointer to the color set to use. If NULL, then the default
00115      * color set (based on the theme colors for 3d-view) is used. 
00116      */
00117     if (color_index > 0) {
00118         bTheme *btheme = UI_GetTheme();
00119         bcolor = &btheme->tarm[(color_index - 1)];
00120     }
00121     else if (color_index == -1) {
00122         /* use the group's own custom color set */
00123         bcolor = (grp) ? &grp->cs : NULL;
00124     }
00125     else 
00126         bcolor = NULL;
00127 }
00128 
00129 /* This function is for brightening/darkening a given color (like UI_ThemeColorShade()) */
00130 static void cp_shade_color3ub(unsigned char cp[3], const int offset)
00131 {
00132     int r, g, b;
00133     
00134     r = offset + (int) cp[0];
00135     CLAMP(r, 0, 255);
00136     g = offset + (int) cp[1];
00137     CLAMP(g, 0, 255);
00138     b = offset + (int) cp[2];
00139     CLAMP(b, 0, 255);
00140     
00141     cp[0] = r;
00142     cp[1] = g;
00143     cp[2] = b;
00144 }
00145 
00146 /* This function sets the gl-color for coloring a certain bone (based on bcolor) */
00147 static short set_pchan_glColor(short colCode, int boneflag, short constflag)
00148 {
00149     switch (colCode) {
00150         case PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL:
00151         {
00152             if (bcolor) {
00153                 unsigned char cp[3];
00154             
00155                 if (boneflag & BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE) {
00156                     copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, bcolor->active);
00157                     if (!(boneflag & BONE_SELECTED)) {
00158                         cp_shade_color3ub(cp, -80);
00159                     }
00160                 }
00161                 else if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00162                     copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, bcolor->select);
00163                 }
00164                 else {
00165                     /* a bit darker than solid */
00166                     copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, bcolor->solid);
00167                     cp_shade_color3ub(cp, -50);
00168                 }
00169             
00170                 glColor3ubv(cp);
00171             }
00172             else {
00173                 if ((boneflag & BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE) && (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED)) {
00174                     UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BONE_POSE, 40);
00175                 }
00176                 else if (boneflag & BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE) {
00177                     UI_ThemeColorBlend(TH_WIRE, TH_BONE_POSE, 0.15f); /* unselected active */
00178                 }
00179                 else if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00180                     UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_POSE);
00181                 }
00182                 else {
00183                     UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);
00184                 }
00185             }
00186     
00187             return 1;
00188         }
00189         break;
00190         
00191         case PCHAN_COLOR_SOLID:
00192         {
00193             if (bcolor) {
00194                 glColor3ubv((unsigned char *)bcolor->solid);
00195             }
00196             else
00197                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
00198             
00199             return 1;
00200         }
00201         break;
00202         
00203         case PCHAN_COLOR_CONSTS:
00204         {
00205             if ((bcolor == NULL) || (bcolor->flag & TH_WIRECOLOR_CONSTCOLS)) {
00206                 if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_TARGET) glColor4ub(255, 150, 0, 80);
00207                 else if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_IK) glColor4ub(255, 255, 0, 80);
00208                 else if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_SPLINEIK) glColor4ub(200, 255, 0, 80);
00209                 else if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_CONST) glColor4ub(0, 255, 120, 80);
00210             
00211                 return 1;
00212             }
00213             else
00214                 return 0;
00215         }
00216         break;
00217 
00218         case PCHAN_COLOR_SPHEREBONE_BASE:
00219         {
00220             if (bcolor) {
00221                 unsigned char cp[3];
00222 
00223                 if (boneflag & BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE) {
00224                     copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, bcolor->active);
00225                 }
00226                 else if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00227                     copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, bcolor->select);
00228                 }
00229                 else {
00230                     copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, bcolor->solid);
00231                 }
00232 
00233                 glColor3ubv(cp);
00234             }
00235             else {
00236                 if (boneflag & BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE) UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BONE_POSE, 40);
00237                 else if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_POSE);
00238                 else UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
00239             }
00240             
00241             return 1;
00242         }
00243         break;
00244         case PCHAN_COLOR_SPHEREBONE_END:
00245         {
00246             if (bcolor) {
00247                 unsigned char cp[3];
00248 
00249                 if (boneflag & BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE) {
00250                     copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, bcolor->active);
00251                     cp_shade_color3ub(cp, 10);
00252                 }
00253                 else if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00254                     copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, bcolor->select);
00255                     cp_shade_color3ub(cp, -30);
00256                 }
00257                 else {
00258                     copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, bcolor->solid);
00259                     cp_shade_color3ub(cp, -30);
00260                 }
00261             
00262                 glColor3ubv(cp);
00263             }
00264             else {
00265                 if (boneflag & BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE) UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BONE_POSE, 10);
00266                 else if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BONE_POSE, -30);
00267                 else UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BONE_SOLID, -30);
00268             }
00269         }
00270         break;
00271         
00272         case PCHAN_COLOR_LINEBONE:
00273         {
00274             /* inner part in background color or constraint */
00275             if ( (constflag) && ((bcolor == NULL) || (bcolor->flag & TH_WIRECOLOR_CONSTCOLS)) ) {
00276                 if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_TARGET) glColor3ub(255, 150, 0);
00277                 else if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_IK) glColor3ub(255, 255, 0);
00278                 else if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_SPLINEIK) glColor3ub(200, 255, 0);
00279                 else if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_CONST) glColor3ub(0, 255, 120);
00280                 else if (constflag) UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_POSE);  /* PCHAN_HAS_ACTION */
00281             }
00282             else {
00283                 if (bcolor) {
00284                     char *cp = bcolor->solid;
00285                     glColor4ub(cp[0], cp[1], cp[2], 204);
00286                 }
00287                 else
00288                     UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, -30);
00289             }
00290         
00291             return 1;
00292         }
00293         break;
00294     }
00295     
00296     return 0;
00297 }

00299 static void set_ebone_glColor(const unsigned int boneflag)
00300 {
00301     if ((boneflag & BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE) && (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED)) {
00302         UI_ThemeColor(TH_EDGE_SELECT);
00303     }
00304     else if (boneflag & BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE) {
00305         UI_ThemeColorBlend(TH_WIRE, TH_EDGE_SELECT, 0.15f); /* unselected active */
00306     }
00307     else if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00308         UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_EDGE_SELECT, -20);
00309     }
00310     else {
00311         UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);
00312     }
00313 }

00317 /* half the cube, in Y */
00318 static float cube[8][3] = {
00319     {-1.0,  0.0, -1.0},
00320     {-1.0,  0.0,  1.0},
00321     {-1.0,  1.0,  1.0},
00322     {-1.0,  1.0, -1.0},
00323     { 1.0,  0.0, -1.0},
00324     { 1.0,  0.0,  1.0},
00325     { 1.0,  1.0,  1.0},
00326     { 1.0,  1.0, -1.0},
00327 };
00328 
00329 static void drawsolidcube_size(float xsize, float ysize, float zsize)
00330 {
00331     static GLuint displist = 0;
00332     float n[3] = {0.0f};
00333     
00334     glScalef(xsize, ysize, zsize);
00335 
00336     if (displist == 0) {
00337         displist = glGenLists(1);
00338         glNewList(displist, GL_COMPILE);
00339 
00340         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00341         n[0] = -1.0;
00342         glNormal3fv(n); 
00343         glVertex3fv(cube[0]); glVertex3fv(cube[1]); glVertex3fv(cube[2]); glVertex3fv(cube[3]);
00344         n[0] = 0;
00345         n[1] = -1.0;
00346         glNormal3fv(n); 
00347         glVertex3fv(cube[0]); glVertex3fv(cube[4]); glVertex3fv(cube[5]); glVertex3fv(cube[1]);
00348         n[1] = 0;
00349         n[0] = 1.0;
00350         glNormal3fv(n); 
00351         glVertex3fv(cube[4]); glVertex3fv(cube[7]); glVertex3fv(cube[6]); glVertex3fv(cube[5]);
00352         n[0] = 0;
00353         n[1] = 1.0;
00354         glNormal3fv(n); 
00355         glVertex3fv(cube[7]); glVertex3fv(cube[3]); glVertex3fv(cube[2]); glVertex3fv(cube[6]);
00356         n[1] = 0;
00357         n[2] = 1.0;
00358         glNormal3fv(n); 
00359         glVertex3fv(cube[1]); glVertex3fv(cube[5]); glVertex3fv(cube[6]); glVertex3fv(cube[2]);
00360         n[2] = -1.0;
00361         glNormal3fv(n); 
00362         glVertex3fv(cube[7]); glVertex3fv(cube[4]); glVertex3fv(cube[0]); glVertex3fv(cube[3]);
00363         glEnd();
00364 
00365         glEndList();
00366     }
00367 
00368     glCallList(displist);
00369 }
00370 
00371 static void drawcube_size(float xsize, float ysize, float zsize)
00372 {
00373     static GLuint displist = 0;
00374     
00375     if (displist == 0) {
00376         displist = glGenLists(1);
00377         glNewList(displist, GL_COMPILE);
00378         
00379         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00380         glVertex3fv(cube[0]); glVertex3fv(cube[1]); glVertex3fv(cube[2]); glVertex3fv(cube[3]);
00381         glVertex3fv(cube[0]); glVertex3fv(cube[4]); glVertex3fv(cube[5]); glVertex3fv(cube[6]);
00382         glVertex3fv(cube[7]); glVertex3fv(cube[4]);
00383         glEnd();
00384         
00385         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00386         glVertex3fv(cube[1]); glVertex3fv(cube[5]);
00387         glVertex3fv(cube[2]); glVertex3fv(cube[6]);
00388         glVertex3fv(cube[3]); glVertex3fv(cube[7]);
00389         glEnd();
00390         
00391         glEndList();
00392     }
00393 
00394     glScalef(xsize, ysize, zsize);
00395     glCallList(displist);
00396     
00397 }

00400 static void draw_bonevert(void)
00401 {
00402     static GLuint displist = 0;
00403     
00404     if (displist == 0) {
00405         GLUquadricObj   *qobj;
00406         
00407         displist = glGenLists(1);
00408         glNewList(displist, GL_COMPILE);
00409             
00410         glPushMatrix();
00411         
00412         qobj    = gluNewQuadric();
00413         gluQuadricDrawStyle(qobj, GLU_SILHOUETTE); 
00414         gluDisk(qobj, 0.0,  0.05, 16, 1);
00415         
00416         glRotatef(90, 0, 1, 0);
00417         gluDisk(qobj, 0.0,  0.05, 16, 1);
00418         
00419         glRotatef(90, 1, 0, 0);
00420         gluDisk(qobj, 0.0,  0.05, 16, 1);
00421         
00422         gluDeleteQuadric(qobj);  
00423         
00424         glPopMatrix();
00425         glEndList();
00426     }
00427 
00428     glCallList(displist);
00429 }
00430 
00431 static void draw_bonevert_solid(void)
00432 {
00433     static GLuint displist = 0;
00434     
00435     if (displist == 0) {
00436         GLUquadricObj *qobj;
00437         
00438         displist = glGenLists(1);
00439         glNewList(displist, GL_COMPILE);
00440         
00441         qobj = gluNewQuadric();
00442         gluQuadricDrawStyle(qobj, GLU_FILL); 
00443         glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00444         gluSphere(qobj, 0.05, 8, 5);
00445         glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00446         gluDeleteQuadric(qobj);  
00447         
00448         glEndList();
00449     }
00450 
00451     glCallList(displist);
00452 }

00454 static float bone_octahedral_verts[6][3] = {
00455     { 0.0f, 0.0f,  0.0f},
00456     { 0.1f, 0.1f,  0.1f},
00457     { 0.1f, 0.1f, -0.1f},
00458     {-0.1f, 0.1f, -0.1f},
00459     {-0.1f, 0.1f,  0.1f},
00460     { 0.0f, 1.0f,  0.0f}
00461 };
00462 
00463 static unsigned int bone_octahedral_wire_sides[8] = {0, 1, 5, 3, 0, 4, 5, 2};
00464 static unsigned int bone_octahedral_wire_square[8] = {1, 2, 3, 4, 1};
00465 
00466 static unsigned int bone_octahedral_solid_tris[8][3] = {
00467     {2, 1, 0}, /* bottom */
00468     {3, 2, 0},
00469     {4, 3, 0},
00470     {1, 4, 0},
00471 
00472     {5, 1, 2}, /* top */
00473     {5, 2, 3},
00474     {5, 3, 4},
00475     {5, 4, 1}
00476 };
00477 
00478 /* aligned with bone_octahedral_solid_tris */
00479 static float bone_octahedral_solid_normals[8][3] = {
00480     { 0.70710683f, -0.70710683f,  0.00000000f},
00481     {-0.00000000f, -0.70710683f, -0.70710683f},
00482     {-0.70710683f, -0.70710683f,  0.00000000f},
00483     { 0.00000000f, -0.70710683f,  0.70710683f},
00484     { 0.99388373f,  0.11043154f, -0.00000000f},
00485     { 0.00000000f,  0.11043154f, -0.99388373f},
00486     {-0.99388373f,  0.11043154f,  0.00000000f},
00487     { 0.00000000f,  0.11043154f,  0.99388373f}
00488 };

00490 static void draw_bone_octahedral(void)
00491 {
00492     static GLuint displist = 0;
00493     
00494     if (displist == 0) {
00495         displist = glGenLists(1);
00496         glNewList(displist, GL_COMPILE);
00497 
00498         /*  Section 1, sides */
00499         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00500         glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, bone_octahedral_verts);
00501         glDrawElements(GL_LINE_LOOP,
00502                        sizeof(bone_octahedral_wire_sides) / sizeof(*bone_octahedral_wire_sides),
00503                        GL_UNSIGNED_INT,
00504                        bone_octahedral_wire_sides);
00505 
00506         /*  Section 1, square */
00507         glDrawElements(GL_LINE_LOOP,
00508                        sizeof(bone_octahedral_wire_square) / sizeof(*bone_octahedral_wire_square),
00509                        GL_UNSIGNED_INT,
00510                        bone_octahedral_wire_square);
00511         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00512         
00513         glEndList();
00514     }
00515 
00516     glCallList(displist);
00517 }   
00518 
00519 static void draw_bone_solid_octahedral(void)
00520 {
00521     static GLuint displist = 0;
00522 
00523     if (displist == 0) {
00524         int i;
00525 
00526         displist = glGenLists(1);
00527         glNewList(displist, GL_COMPILE);
00528 
00529 #if 1
00530         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00531         for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00532             glNormal3fv(bone_octahedral_solid_normals[i]);
00533             glVertex3fv(bone_octahedral_verts[bone_octahedral_solid_tris[i][0]]);
00534             glVertex3fv(bone_octahedral_verts[bone_octahedral_solid_tris[i][1]]);
00535             glVertex3fv(bone_octahedral_verts[bone_octahedral_solid_tris[i][2]]);
00536         }
00537 
00538         glEnd();
00539 
00540 #else   /* not working because each vert needs a different normal */
00541         glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00542         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00543         glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, 0, bone_octahedral_solid_normals);
00544         glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, bone_octahedral_verts);
00545         glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, sizeof(bone_octahedral_solid_tris) / sizeof(unsigned int),
00546                        GL_UNSIGNED_INT, bone_octahedral_solid_tris);
00547         glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00548         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00549 #endif
00550 
00551         glEndList();
00552     }
00553 
00554     glCallList(displist);
00555 }

00559 
00560 static void draw_bone_points(int dt, int armflag, unsigned int boneflag, int id)
00561 {
00562     /*  Draw root point if we are not connected */
00563     if ((boneflag & BONE_CONNECTED) == 0) {
00564         if (id != -1)
00565             glLoadName(id | BONESEL_ROOT);
00566         
00567         if (dt <= OB_WIRE) {
00568             if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
00569                 if (boneflag & BONE_ROOTSEL) UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX_SELECT);
00570                 else UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX);
00571             }
00572         }
00573         else {
00574             if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE) 
00575                 set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_SOLID, boneflag, 0);
00576             else
00577                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
00578         }
00579         
00580         if (dt > OB_WIRE) 
00581             draw_bonevert_solid();
00582         else 
00583             draw_bonevert();
00584     }
00585     
00586     /*  Draw tip point */
00587     if (id != -1)
00588         glLoadName(id | BONESEL_TIP);
00589     
00590     if (dt <= OB_WIRE) {
00591         if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
00592             if (boneflag & BONE_TIPSEL) UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX_SELECT);
00593             else UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX);
00594         }
00595     }
00596     else {
00597         if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE) 
00598             set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_SOLID, boneflag, 0);
00599         else
00600             UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
00601     }
00602     
00603     glTranslatef(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00604     if (dt > OB_WIRE) 
00605         draw_bonevert_solid();
00606     else 
00607         draw_bonevert();
00608     glTranslatef(0.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f);
00609     
00610 }
00611 
00612 /* 16 values of sin function (still same result!) */
00613 static float si[16] = {
00614     0.00000000f,
00615     0.20129852f, 0.39435585f,
00616     0.57126821f, 0.72479278f,
00617     0.84864425f, 0.93775213f,
00618     0.98846832f, 0.99871650f,
00619     0.96807711f, 0.89780453f,
00620     0.79077573f, 0.65137248f,
00621     0.48530196f, 0.29936312f,
00622     0.10116832f
00623 };
00624 /* 16 values of cos function (still same result!) */
00625 static float co[16] = {
00626     1.00000000f,
00627     0.97952994f, 0.91895781f,
00628     0.82076344f, 0.68896691f,
00629     0.52896401f, 0.34730525f,
00630     0.15142777f, -0.05064916f,
00631     -0.25065253f, -0.44039415f,
00632     -0.61210598f, -0.75875812f,
00633     -0.87434661f, -0.95413925f,
00634     -0.99486932f
00635 };
00636 
00637 
00638 
00639 /* smat, imat = mat & imat to draw screenaligned */
00640 static void draw_sphere_bone_dist(float smat[][4], float imat[][4], bPoseChannel *pchan, EditBone *ebone)
00641 {
00642     float head, tail, dist /*, length*/;
00643     float *headvec, *tailvec, dirvec[3];
00644     
00645     /* figure out the sizes of spheres */
00646     if (ebone) {
00647         /* this routine doesn't call get_matrix_editbone() that calculates it */
00648         ebone->length = len_v3v3(ebone->head, ebone->tail);
00649 
00650         /*length= ebone->length;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00651         tail = ebone->rad_tail;
00652         dist = ebone->dist;
00653         if (ebone->parent && (ebone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED))
00654             head = ebone->parent->rad_tail;
00655         else
00656             head = ebone->rad_head;
00657         headvec = ebone->head;
00658         tailvec = ebone->tail;
00659     }
00660     else {
00661         /*length= pchan->bone->length;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00662         tail = pchan->bone->rad_tail;
00663         dist = pchan->bone->dist;
00664         if (pchan->parent && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED))
00665             head = pchan->parent->bone->rad_tail;
00666         else
00667             head = pchan->bone->rad_head;
00668         headvec = pchan->pose_head;
00669         tailvec = pchan->pose_tail;
00670     }
00671     
00672     /* ***** draw it ***** */
00673     
00674     /* move vector to viewspace */
00675     sub_v3_v3v3(dirvec, tailvec, headvec);
00676     mul_mat3_m4_v3(smat, dirvec);
00677     /* clear zcomp */
00678     dirvec[2] = 0.0f;
00679 
00680     if (head != tail) {
00681         /* correction when viewing along the bones axis
00682          * it pops in and out but better then artifacts, [#23841] */
00683         float view_dist = len_v2(dirvec);
00684 
00685         if (head - view_dist > tail) {
00686             tailvec = headvec;
00687             tail = head;
00688             zero_v3(dirvec);
00689             dirvec[0] = 0.00001; // XXX. weak but ok
00690         }
00691         else if (tail - view_dist > head) {
00692             headvec = tailvec;
00693             head = tail;
00694             zero_v3(dirvec);
00695             dirvec[0] = 0.00001; // XXX. weak but ok
00696         }
00697     }
00698 
00699     /* move vector back */
00700     mul_mat3_m4_v3(imat, dirvec);
00701     
00702     if (0.0f != normalize_v3(dirvec)) {
00703         float norvec[3], vec1[3], vec2[3], vec[3];
00704         int a;
00705         
00706         //mul_v3_fl(dirvec, head);
00707         cross_v3_v3v3(norvec, dirvec, imat[2]);
00708         
00709         glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
00710         
00711         for (a = 0; a < 16; a++) {
00712             vec[0] = -*(si + a) * dirvec[0] + *(co + a) * norvec[0];
00713             vec[1] = -*(si + a) * dirvec[1] + *(co + a) * norvec[1];
00714             vec[2] = -*(si + a) * dirvec[2] + *(co + a) * norvec[2];
00715 
00716             madd_v3_v3v3fl(vec1, headvec, vec, head);
00717             madd_v3_v3v3fl(vec2, headvec, vec, head + dist);
00718             
00719             glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 50);
00720             glVertex3fv(vec1);
00721             //glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 0);
00722             glVertex3fv(vec2);
00723         }
00724         
00725         for (a = 15; a >= 0; a--) {
00726             vec[0] = *(si + a) * dirvec[0] + *(co + a) * norvec[0];
00727             vec[1] = *(si + a) * dirvec[1] + *(co + a) * norvec[1];
00728             vec[2] = *(si + a) * dirvec[2] + *(co + a) * norvec[2];
00729 
00730             madd_v3_v3v3fl(vec1, tailvec, vec, tail);
00731             madd_v3_v3v3fl(vec2, tailvec, vec, tail + dist);
00732             
00733             //glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 50);
00734             glVertex3fv(vec1);
00735             //glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 0);
00736             glVertex3fv(vec2);
00737         }
00738         /* make it cyclic... */
00739         
00740         vec[0] = -*(si) * dirvec[0] + *(co) * norvec[0];
00741         vec[1] = -*(si) * dirvec[1] + *(co) * norvec[1];
00742         vec[2] = -*(si) * dirvec[2] + *(co) * norvec[2];
00743 
00744         madd_v3_v3v3fl(vec1, headvec, vec, head);
00745         madd_v3_v3v3fl(vec2, headvec, vec, head + dist);
00746 
00747         //glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 50);
00748         glVertex3fv(vec1);
00749         //glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 0);
00750         glVertex3fv(vec2);
00751         
00752         glEnd();
00753     }
00754 }
00755 
00756 
00757 /* smat, imat = mat & imat to draw screenaligned */
00758 static void draw_sphere_bone_wire(float smat[][4], float imat[][4],
00759                                   int armflag, int boneflag, short constflag, unsigned int id,
00760                                   bPoseChannel *pchan, EditBone *ebone)
00761 {
00762     float head, tail /*, length*/;
00763     float *headvec, *tailvec, dirvec[3];
00764     
00765     /* figure out the sizes of spheres */
00766     if (ebone) {
00767         /* this routine doesn't call get_matrix_editbone() that calculates it */
00768         ebone->length = len_v3v3(ebone->head, ebone->tail);
00769         
00770         /*length= ebone->length;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00771         tail = ebone->rad_tail;
00772         if (ebone->parent && (boneflag & BONE_CONNECTED))
00773             head = ebone->parent->rad_tail;
00774         else
00775             head = ebone->rad_head;
00776         headvec = ebone->head;
00777         tailvec = ebone->tail;
00778     }
00779     else {
00780         /*length= pchan->bone->length;*/ /*UNUSED*/
00781         tail = pchan->bone->rad_tail;
00782         if ((pchan->parent) && (boneflag & BONE_CONNECTED))
00783             head = pchan->parent->bone->rad_tail;
00784         else
00785             head = pchan->bone->rad_head;
00786         headvec = pchan->pose_head;
00787         tailvec = pchan->pose_tail;
00788     }
00789     
00790     /* sphere root color */
00791     if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
00792         if (boneflag & BONE_ROOTSEL) UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX_SELECT);
00793         else UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX);
00794     }
00795     else if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE)
00796         set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL, boneflag, constflag);
00797     
00798     /*  Draw root point if we are not connected */
00799     if ((boneflag & BONE_CONNECTED) == 0) {
00800         if (id != -1)
00801             glLoadName(id | BONESEL_ROOT);
00802         
00803         drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, headvec, head, imat);
00804     }
00805     
00806     /*  Draw tip point */
00807     if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
00808         if (boneflag & BONE_TIPSEL) UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX_SELECT);
00809         else UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX);
00810     }
00811     
00812     if (id != -1)
00813         glLoadName(id | BONESEL_TIP);
00814     
00815     drawcircball(GL_LINE_LOOP, tailvec, tail, imat);
00816     
00817     /* base */
00818     if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
00819         if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) UI_ThemeColor(TH_SELECT);
00820         else UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);
00821     }
00822     
00823     sub_v3_v3v3(dirvec, tailvec, headvec);
00824     
00825     /* move vector to viewspace */
00826     mul_mat3_m4_v3(smat, dirvec);
00827     /* clear zcomp */
00828     dirvec[2] = 0.0f;
00829     /* move vector back */
00830     mul_mat3_m4_v3(imat, dirvec);
00831     
00832     if (0.0f != normalize_v3(dirvec)) {
00833         float norvech[3], norvect[3], vec[3];
00834         
00835         copy_v3_v3(vec, dirvec);
00836         
00837         mul_v3_fl(dirvec, head);
00838         cross_v3_v3v3(norvech, dirvec, imat[2]);
00839         
00840         mul_v3_fl(vec, tail);
00841         cross_v3_v3v3(norvect, vec, imat[2]);
00842         
00843         if (id != -1)
00844             glLoadName(id | BONESEL_BONE);
00845         
00846         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00847 
00848         add_v3_v3v3(vec, headvec, norvech);
00849         glVertex3fv(vec);
00850 
00851         add_v3_v3v3(vec, tailvec, norvect);
00852         glVertex3fv(vec);
00853 
00854         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, headvec, norvech);
00855         glVertex3fv(vec);
00856 
00857         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, tailvec, norvect);
00858         glVertex3fv(vec);
00859         
00860         glEnd();
00861     }
00862 }
00863 
00864 /* does wire only for outline selecting */
00865 static void draw_sphere_bone(int dt, int armflag, int boneflag, short constflag, unsigned int id,
00866                              bPoseChannel *pchan, EditBone *ebone)
00867 {
00868     GLUquadricObj *qobj;
00869     float head, tail, length;
00870     float fac1, fac2;
00871     
00872     glPushMatrix();
00873     qobj = gluNewQuadric();
00874 
00875     /* figure out the sizes of spheres */
00876     if (ebone) {
00877         length = ebone->length;
00878         tail = ebone->rad_tail;
00879         if (ebone->parent && (boneflag & BONE_CONNECTED))
00880             head = ebone->parent->rad_tail;
00881         else
00882             head = ebone->rad_head;
00883     }
00884     else {
00885         length = pchan->bone->length;
00886         tail = pchan->bone->rad_tail;
00887         if (pchan->parent && (boneflag & BONE_CONNECTED))
00888             head = pchan->parent->bone->rad_tail;
00889         else
00890             head = pchan->bone->rad_head;
00891     }
00892     
00893     /* move to z-axis space */
00894     glRotatef(-90.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00895 
00896     if (dt == OB_SOLID) {
00897         /* set up solid drawing */
00898         glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00899         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00900         
00901         gluQuadricDrawStyle(qobj, GLU_FILL); 
00902         glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00903     }
00904     else {
00905         gluQuadricDrawStyle(qobj, GLU_SILHOUETTE); 
00906     }
00907     
00908     /* sphere root color */
00909     if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
00910         if (boneflag & BONE_ROOTSEL) UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX_SELECT);
00911         else UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BONE_SOLID, -30);
00912     }
00913     else if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE)
00914         set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_SPHEREBONE_END, boneflag, constflag);
00915     else if (dt == OB_SOLID)
00916         UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BONE_SOLID, -30);
00917     
00918     /*  Draw root point if we are not connected */
00919     if ((boneflag & BONE_CONNECTED) == 0) {
00920         if (id != -1)
00921             glLoadName(id | BONESEL_ROOT);
00922         gluSphere(qobj, head, 16, 10);
00923     }
00924     
00925     /*  Draw tip point */
00926     if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
00927         if (boneflag & BONE_TIPSEL) UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX_SELECT);
00928         else UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BONE_SOLID, -30);
00929     }
00930 
00931     if (id != -1)
00932         glLoadName(id | BONESEL_TIP);
00933     
00934     glTranslatef(0.0f, 0.0f, length);
00935     gluSphere(qobj, tail, 16, 10);
00936     glTranslatef(0.0f, 0.0f, -length);
00937     
00938     /* base */
00939     if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
00940         if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) UI_ThemeColor(TH_SELECT);
00941         else UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
00942     }
00943     else if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE)
00944         set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_SPHEREBONE_BASE, boneflag, constflag);
00945     else if (dt == OB_SOLID)
00946         UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
00947     
00948     fac1 = (length - head) / length;
00949     fac2 = (length - tail) / length;
00950     
00951     if (length > (head + tail)) {
00952         if (id != -1)
00953             glLoadName(id | BONESEL_BONE);
00954         
00955         glEnable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL);
00956         glPolygonOffset(-1.0f, -1.0f);
00957         
00958         glTranslatef(0.0f, 0.0f, head);
00959         gluCylinder(qobj, fac1 * head + (1.0f - fac1) * tail, fac2 * tail + (1.0f - fac2) * head, length - head - tail, 16, 1);
00960         glTranslatef(0.0f, 0.0f, -head);
00961         
00962         glDisable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL);
00963         
00964         /* draw sphere on extrema */
00965         glTranslatef(0.0f, 0.0f, length - tail);
00966         gluSphere(qobj, fac2 * tail + (1.0f - fac2) * head, 16, 10);
00967         glTranslatef(0.0f, 0.0f, -length + tail);
00968         
00969         glTranslatef(0.0f, 0.0f, head);
00970         gluSphere(qobj, fac1 * head + (1.0f - fac1) * tail, 16, 10);
00971     }
00972     else {      
00973         /* 1 sphere in center */
00974         glTranslatef(0.0f, 0.0f, (head + length - tail) / 2.0f);
00975         gluSphere(qobj, fac1 * head + (1.0f - fac1) * tail, 16, 10);
00976     }
00977     
00978     /* restore */
00979     if (dt == OB_SOLID) {
00980         glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00981         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00982         glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00983     }
00984     
00985     glPopMatrix();
00986     gluDeleteQuadric(qobj);  
00987 }
00988 
00989 static GLubyte bm_dot6[] = {0x0, 0x18, 0x3C, 0x7E, 0x7E, 0x3C, 0x18, 0x0};
00990 static GLubyte bm_dot8[] = {0x3C, 0x7E, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0x7E, 0x3C};
00991 
00992 static GLubyte bm_dot5[] = {0x0, 0x0, 0x10, 0x38, 0x7c, 0x38, 0x10, 0x0};
00993 static GLubyte bm_dot7[] = {0x0, 0x38, 0x7C, 0xFE, 0xFE, 0xFE, 0x7C, 0x38};
00994 
00995 
00996 static void draw_line_bone(int armflag, int boneflag, short constflag, unsigned int id,
00997                            bPoseChannel *pchan, EditBone *ebone)
00998 {
00999     float length;
01000     
01001     glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);
01002     
01003     if (pchan) 
01004         length = pchan->bone->length;
01005     else 
01006         length = ebone->length;
01007     
01008     glPushMatrix();
01009     glScalef(length, length, length);
01010     
01011     /* this chunk not in object mode */
01012     if (armflag & (ARM_EDITMODE | ARM_POSEMODE)) {
01013         glLineWidth(4.0f);
01014         if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE)
01015             set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL, boneflag, constflag);
01016         else if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
01017             UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);
01018         }
01019         
01020         /*  Draw root point if we are not connected */
01021         if ((boneflag & BONE_CONNECTED) == 0) {
01022             if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) {  // no bitmap in selection mode, crashes 3d cards...
01023                 glLoadName(id | BONESEL_ROOT);
01024                 glBegin(GL_POINTS);
01025                 glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01026                 glEnd();
01027             }
01028             else {
01029                 glRasterPos3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01030                 glBitmap(8, 8, 4, 4, 0, 0, bm_dot8);
01031             }
01032         }
01033         
01034         if (id != -1)
01035             glLoadName((GLuint) id | BONESEL_BONE);
01036         
01037         glBegin(GL_LINES);
01038         glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01039         glVertex3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
01040         glEnd();
01041         
01042         /* tip */
01043         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) {  
01044             /* no bitmap in selection mode, crashes 3d cards... */
01045             glLoadName(id | BONESEL_TIP);
01046             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
01047             glVertex3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
01048             glEnd();
01049         }
01050         else {
01051             glRasterPos3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
01052             glBitmap(8, 8, 4, 4, 0, 0, bm_dot7);
01053         }
01054         
01055         /* further we send no names */
01056         if (id != -1)
01057             glLoadName(id & 0xFFFF);  /* object tag, for bordersel optim */
01058         
01059         if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE)
01060             set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_LINEBONE, boneflag, constflag);
01061     }
01062     
01063     glLineWidth(2.0);
01064     
01065     /*Draw root point if we are not connected */
01066     if ((boneflag & BONE_CONNECTED) == 0) {
01067         if ((G.f & G_PICKSEL) == 0) {
01068             /* no bitmap in selection mode, crashes 3d cards... */
01069             if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
01070                 if (boneflag & BONE_ROOTSEL) UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX_SELECT);
01071                 else UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX);
01072             }
01073             glRasterPos3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01074             glBitmap(8, 8, 4, 4, 0, 0, bm_dot6);
01075         }
01076     }
01077     
01078     if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
01079         if (boneflag & BONE_SELECTED) UI_ThemeColor(TH_EDGE_SELECT);
01080         else UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, -30);
01081     }
01082     glBegin(GL_LINES);
01083     glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01084     glVertex3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
01085     glEnd();
01086     
01087     /* tip */
01088     if ((G.f & G_PICKSEL) == 0) {
01089         /* no bitmap in selection mode, crashes 3d cards... */
01090         if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
01091             if (boneflag & BONE_TIPSEL) UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX_SELECT);
01092             else UI_ThemeColor(TH_VERTEX);
01093         }
01094         glRasterPos3f(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
01095         glBitmap(8, 8, 4, 4, 0, 0, bm_dot5);
01096     }
01097     
01098     glLineWidth(1.0);
01099     
01100     glPopMatrix();
01101 }
01102 
01103 static void draw_b_bone_boxes(int dt, bPoseChannel *pchan, float xwidth, float length, float zwidth)
01104 {
01105     int segments = 0;
01106     
01107     if (pchan) 
01108         segments = pchan->bone->segments;
01109     
01110     if ((segments > 1) && (pchan)) {
01111         float dlen = length / (float)segments;
01112         Mat4 *bbone = b_bone_spline_setup(pchan, 0);
01113         int a;
01114         
01115         for (a = 0; a < segments; a++, bbone++) {
01116             glPushMatrix();
01117             glMultMatrixf(bbone->mat);
01118             if (dt == OB_SOLID) drawsolidcube_size(xwidth, dlen, zwidth);
01119             else drawcube_size(xwidth, dlen, zwidth);
01120             glPopMatrix();
01121         }
01122     }
01123     else {
01124         glPushMatrix();
01125         if (dt == OB_SOLID) drawsolidcube_size(xwidth, length, zwidth);
01126         else drawcube_size(xwidth, length, zwidth);
01127         glPopMatrix();
01128     }
01129 }
01130 
01131 static void draw_b_bone(int dt, int armflag, int boneflag, short constflag, unsigned int id,
01132                         bPoseChannel *pchan, EditBone *ebone)
01133 {
01134     float xwidth, length, zwidth;
01135     
01136     if (pchan) {
01137         xwidth = pchan->bone->xwidth;
01138         length = pchan->bone->length;
01139         zwidth = pchan->bone->zwidth;
01140     }
01141     else {
01142         xwidth = ebone->xwidth;
01143         length = ebone->length;
01144         zwidth = ebone->zwidth;
01145     }
01146     
01147     /* draw points only if... */
01148     if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
01149         /* move to unitspace */
01150         glPushMatrix();
01151         glScalef(length, length, length);
01152         draw_bone_points(dt, armflag, boneflag, id);
01153         glPopMatrix();
01154         length *= 0.95f; // make vertices visible
01155     }
01156 
01157     /* colors for modes */
01158     if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE) {
01159         if (dt <= OB_WIRE)
01160             set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL, boneflag, constflag);
01161         else 
01162             set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_SOLID, boneflag, constflag);
01163     }
01164     else if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
01165         if (dt == OB_WIRE) {
01166             set_ebone_glColor(boneflag);
01167         }
01168         else 
01169             UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
01170     }
01171     
01172     if (id != -1) {
01173         glLoadName((GLuint) id | BONESEL_BONE);
01174     }
01175     
01176     /* set up solid drawing */
01177     if (dt > OB_WIRE) {
01178         glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
01179         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
01180         
01181         if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE)
01182             set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_SOLID, boneflag, constflag);
01183         else
01184             UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
01185         
01186         draw_b_bone_boxes(OB_SOLID, pchan, xwidth, length, zwidth);
01187         
01188         /* disable solid drawing */
01189         glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
01190         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
01191     }
01192     else {  
01193         /* wire */
01194         if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE) {
01195             if (constflag) {
01196                 /* set constraint colors */
01197                 if (set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_CONSTS, boneflag, constflag)) {
01198                     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01199                     
01200                     draw_b_bone_boxes(OB_SOLID, pchan, xwidth, length, zwidth);
01201                     
01202                     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01203                 }
01204                 
01205                 /* restore colors */
01206                 set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL, boneflag, constflag);
01207             }
01208         }       
01209         
01210         draw_b_bone_boxes(OB_WIRE, pchan, xwidth, length, zwidth);      
01211     }
01212 }
01213 
01214 static void draw_wire_bone_segments(bPoseChannel *pchan, Mat4 *bbones, float length, int segments)
01215 {
01216     if ((segments > 1) && (pchan)) {
01217         float dlen = length / (float)segments;
01218         Mat4 *bbone = bbones;
01219         int a;
01220         
01221         for (a = 0; a < segments; a++, bbone++) {
01222             glPushMatrix();
01223             glMultMatrixf(bbone->mat);
01224             
01225             glBegin(GL_LINES);
01226             glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01227             glVertex3f(0.0f, dlen, 0.0f);
01228             glEnd(); // GL_LINES
01229             
01230             glPopMatrix();
01231         }
01232     }
01233     else {
01234         glPushMatrix();
01235         
01236         glBegin(GL_LINES);
01237         glVertex3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01238         glVertex3f(0.0f, length, 0.0f);
01239         glEnd();
01240         
01241         glPopMatrix();
01242     }
01243 }
01244 
01245 static void draw_wire_bone(int dt, int armflag, int boneflag, short constflag, unsigned int id,
01246                            bPoseChannel *pchan, EditBone *ebone)
01247 {
01248     Mat4 *bbones = NULL;
01249     int segments = 0;
01250     float length;
01251     
01252     if (pchan) {
01253         segments = pchan->bone->segments;
01254         length = pchan->bone->length;
01255         
01256         if (segments > 1)
01257             bbones = b_bone_spline_setup(pchan, 0);
01258     }
01259     else 
01260         length = ebone->length;
01261     
01262     /* draw points only if... */
01263     if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
01264         /* move to unitspace */
01265         glPushMatrix();
01266         glScalef(length, length, length);
01267         draw_bone_points(dt, armflag, boneflag, id);
01268         glPopMatrix();
01269         length *= 0.95f;    // make vertices visible
01270     }
01271     
01272     /* this chunk not in object mode */
01273     if (armflag & (ARM_EDITMODE | ARM_POSEMODE)) {
01274         if (id != -1)
01275             glLoadName((GLuint) id | BONESEL_BONE);
01276         
01277         draw_wire_bone_segments(pchan, bbones, length, segments);
01278         
01279         /* further we send no names */
01280         if (id != -1)
01281             glLoadName(id & 0xFFFF);    /* object tag, for bordersel optim */
01282     }
01283     
01284     /* colors for modes */
01285     if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE) {
01286         set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL, boneflag, constflag);
01287     }
01288     else if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
01289         set_ebone_glColor(boneflag);
01290     }
01291     
01292     /* draw normal */
01293     draw_wire_bone_segments(pchan, bbones, length, segments);
01294 }
01295 
01296 static void draw_bone(int dt, int armflag, int boneflag, short constflag, unsigned int id, float length)
01297 {
01298     
01299     /* Draw a 3d octahedral bone, we use normalized space based on length,
01300      * for glDisplayLists */
01301     
01302     glScalef(length, length, length);
01303 
01304     /* set up solid drawing */
01305     if (dt > OB_WIRE) {
01306         glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
01307         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
01308         UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
01309     }
01310     
01311     /* colors for posemode */
01312     if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE) {
01313         if (dt <= OB_WIRE)
01314             set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL, boneflag, constflag);
01315         else 
01316             set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_SOLID, boneflag, constflag);
01317     }
01318     
01319     
01320     draw_bone_points(dt, armflag, boneflag, id);
01321     
01322     /* now draw the bone itself */
01323     if (id != -1) {
01324         glLoadName((GLuint) id | BONESEL_BONE);
01325     }
01326     
01327     /* wire? */
01328     if (dt <= OB_WIRE) {
01329         /* colors */
01330         if (armflag & ARM_EDITMODE) {
01331             set_ebone_glColor(boneflag);
01332         }
01333         else if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE) {
01334             if (constflag) {
01335                 /* draw constraint colors */
01336                 if (set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_CONSTS, boneflag, constflag)) {   
01337                     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01338                     
01339                     draw_bone_solid_octahedral();
01340                     
01341                     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01342                 }
01343                 
01344                 /* restore colors */
01345                 set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL, boneflag, constflag);
01346             }
01347         }       
01348         draw_bone_octahedral();
01349     }
01350     else {  
01351         /* solid */
01352         if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE)
01353             set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_SOLID, boneflag, constflag);
01354         else
01355             UI_ThemeColor(TH_BONE_SOLID);
01356         draw_bone_solid_octahedral();
01357     }
01358 
01359     /* disable solid drawing */
01360     if (dt > OB_WIRE) {
01361         glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
01362         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
01363     }
01364 }
01365 
01366 static void draw_custom_bone(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, Object *ob,
01367                              int dt, int armflag, int boneflag, unsigned int id, float length)
01368 {
01369     if (ob == NULL) return;
01370     
01371     glScalef(length, length, length);
01372     
01373     /* colors for posemode */
01374     if (armflag & ARM_POSEMODE) {
01375         set_pchan_glColor(PCHAN_COLOR_NORMAL, boneflag, 0);
01376     }
01377     
01378     if (id != -1) {
01379         glLoadName((GLuint) id | BONESEL_BONE);
01380     }
01381     
01382     draw_object_instance(scene, v3d, rv3d, ob, dt, armflag & ARM_POSEMODE);
01383 }
01384 
01385 
01386 static void pchan_draw_IK_root_lines(bPoseChannel *pchan, short only_temp)
01387 {
01388     bConstraint *con;
01389     bPoseChannel *parchan;
01390     
01391     for (con = pchan->constraints.first; con; con = con->next) {
01392         if (con->enforce == 0.0f)
01393             continue;
01394         
01395         switch (con->type) {
01396             case CONSTRAINT_TYPE_KINEMATIC:
01397             {
01398                 bKinematicConstraint *data = (bKinematicConstraint *)con->data;
01399                 int segcount = 0;
01400                 
01401                 /* if only_temp, only draw if it is a temporary ik-chain */
01402                 if ((only_temp) && !(data->flag & CONSTRAINT_IK_TEMP))
01403                     continue;
01404                 
01405                 setlinestyle(3);
01406                 glBegin(GL_LINES);
01407                 
01408                 /* exclude tip from chain? */
01409                 if ((data->flag & CONSTRAINT_IK_TIP) == 0)
01410                     parchan = pchan->parent;
01411                 else
01412                     parchan = pchan;
01413                 
01414                 glVertex3fv(parchan->pose_tail);
01415                 
01416                 /* Find the chain's root */
01417                 while (parchan->parent) {
01418                     segcount++;
01419                     if (segcount == data->rootbone || segcount > 255) break;  // 255 is weak
01420                     parchan = parchan->parent;
01421                 }
01422                 if (parchan)
01423                     glVertex3fv(parchan->pose_head);
01424                 
01425                 glEnd();
01426                 setlinestyle(0);
01427             }
01428             break;
01429             case CONSTRAINT_TYPE_SPLINEIK: 
01430             {
01431                 bSplineIKConstraint *data = (bSplineIKConstraint *)con->data;
01432                 int segcount = 0;
01433                 
01434                 setlinestyle(3);
01435                 glBegin(GL_LINES);
01436                 
01437                 parchan = pchan;
01438                 glVertex3fv(parchan->pose_tail);
01439                 
01440                 /* Find the chain's root */
01441                 while (parchan->parent) {
01442                     segcount++;
01443                     // FIXME: revise the breaking conditions
01444                     if (segcount == data->chainlen || segcount > 255) break;  // 255 is weak
01445                     parchan = parchan->parent;
01446                 }
01447                 if (parchan) // XXX revise the breaking conditions to only stop at the tail?
01448                     glVertex3fv(parchan->pose_head);
01449                 
01450                 glEnd();
01451                 setlinestyle(0);
01452             }
01453             break;
01454         }
01455     }
01456 }
01457 
01458 static void bgl_sphere_project(float ax, float az)
01459 {
01460     float dir[3], sine, q3;
01461 
01462     sine = 1.0f - ax * ax - az * az;
01463     q3 = (sine < 0.0f) ? 0.0f : (float)(2.0 * sqrt(sine));
01464 
01465     dir[0] = -az * q3;
01466     dir[1] = 1.0f - 2.0f * sine;
01467     dir[2] = ax * q3;
01468 
01469     glVertex3fv(dir);
01470 }
01471 
01472 static void draw_dof_ellipse(float ax, float az)
01473 {
01474     static float staticSine[16] = {
01475         0.0f, 0.104528463268f, 0.207911690818f, 0.309016994375f,
01476         0.406736643076f, 0.5f, 0.587785252292f, 0.669130606359f,
01477         0.743144825477f, 0.809016994375f, 0.866025403784f,
01478         0.913545457643f, 0.951056516295f, 0.978147600734f,
01479         0.994521895368f, 1.0f
01480     };
01481 
01482     int i, j, n = 16;
01483     float x, z, px, pz;
01484 
01485     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01486     glDepthMask(0);
01487 
01488     glColor4ub(70, 70, 70, 50);
01489 
01490     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01491     pz = 0.0f;
01492     for (i = 1; i < n; i++) {
01493         z = staticSine[i];
01494         
01495         px = 0.0f;
01496         for (j = 1; j < n - i + 1; j++) {
01497             x = staticSine[j];
01498             
01499             if (j == n - i) {
01500                 glEnd();
01501                 glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
01502                 bgl_sphere_project(ax * px, az * z);
01503                 bgl_sphere_project(ax * px, az * pz);
01504                 bgl_sphere_project(ax * x, az * pz);
01505                 glEnd();
01506                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01507             }
01508             else {
01509                 bgl_sphere_project(ax * x, az * z);
01510                 bgl_sphere_project(ax * x, az * pz);
01511                 bgl_sphere_project(ax * px, az * pz);
01512                 bgl_sphere_project(ax * px, az * z);
01513             }
01514             
01515             px = x;
01516         }
01517         pz = z;
01518     }
01519     glEnd();
01520 
01521     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01522     glDepthMask(1);
01523 
01524     glColor3ub(0, 0, 0);
01525 
01526     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01527     for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01528         bgl_sphere_project(staticSine[n - i - 1] * ax, staticSine[i] * az);
01529     glEnd();
01530 }
01531 
01532 static void draw_pose_dofs(Object *ob)
01533 {
01534     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
01535     bPoseChannel *pchan;
01536     Bone *bone;
01537     
01538     for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
01539         bone = pchan->bone;
01540         
01541         if ( (bone) && !(bone->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_P | BONE_HIDDEN_PG))) {
01542             if (bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
01543                 if (bone->layer & arm->layer) {
01544                     if (pchan->ikflag & (BONE_IK_XLIMIT | BONE_IK_ZLIMIT)) {
01545                         if (ED_pose_channel_in_IK_chain(ob, pchan)) {
01546                             float corner[4][3], posetrans[3], mat[4][4];
01547                             float phi = 0.0f, theta = 0.0f, scale;
01548                             int a, i;
01549                             
01550                             /* in parent-bone pose, but own restspace */
01551                             glPushMatrix();
01552                             
01553                             copy_v3_v3(posetrans, pchan->pose_mat[3]);
01554                             glTranslatef(posetrans[0], posetrans[1], posetrans[2]);
01555                             
01556                             if (pchan->parent) {
01557                                 copy_m4_m4(mat, pchan->parent->pose_mat);
01558                                 mat[3][0] = mat[3][1] = mat[3][2] = 0.0f;
01559                                 glMultMatrixf(mat);
01560                             }
01561                             
01562                             copy_m4_m3(mat, pchan->bone->bone_mat);
01563                             glMultMatrixf(mat);
01564                             
01565                             scale = bone->length * pchan->size[1];
01566                             glScalef(scale, scale, scale);
01567                             
01568                             if (pchan->ikflag & BONE_IK_XLIMIT) {
01569                                 if (pchan->ikflag & BONE_IK_ZLIMIT) {
01570                                     float amin[3], amax[3];
01571                                     
01572                                     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
01573                                         /* *0.5f here comes from M_PI/360.0f when rotations were still in degrees */
01574                                         amin[i] = (float)sin(pchan->limitmin[i] * 0.5f);
01575                                         amax[i] = (float)sin(pchan->limitmax[i] * 0.5f);
01576                                     }
01577                                     
01578                                     glScalef(1.0f, -1.0f, 1.0f);
01579                                     if ((amin[0] != 0.0f) && (amin[2] != 0.0f))
01580                                         draw_dof_ellipse(amin[0], amin[2]);
01581                                     if ((amin[0] != 0.0f) && (amax[2] != 0.0f))
01582                                         draw_dof_ellipse(amin[0], amax[2]);
01583                                     if ((amax[0] != 0.0f) && (amin[2] != 0.0f))
01584                                         draw_dof_ellipse(amax[0], amin[2]);
01585                                     if ((amax[0] != 0.0f) && (amax[2] != 0.0f))
01586                                         draw_dof_ellipse(amax[0], amax[2]);
01587                                     glScalef(1.0f, -1.0f, 1.0f);
01588                                 }
01589                             }
01590                             
01591                             /* arcs */
01592                             if (pchan->ikflag & BONE_IK_ZLIMIT) {
01593                                 /* OpenGL requires rotations in degrees; so we're taking the average angle here */
01594                                 theta = RAD2DEGF(0.5f * (pchan->limitmin[2] + pchan->limitmax[2]));
01595                                 glRotatef(theta, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01596                                 
01597                                 glColor3ub(50, 50, 255);    // blue, Z axis limit
01598                                 glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01599                                 for (a = -16; a <= 16; a++) {
01600                                     /* *0.5f here comes from M_PI/360.0f when rotations were still in degrees */
01601                                     float fac = ((float)a) / 16.0f * 0.5f;
01602                                     
01603                                     phi = fac * (pchan->limitmax[2] - pchan->limitmin[2]);
01604                                     
01605                                     i = (a == -16) ? 0 : 1;
01606                                     corner[i][0] = (float)sin(phi);
01607                                     corner[i][1] = (float)cos(phi);
01608                                     corner[i][2] = 0.0f;
01609                                     glVertex3fv(corner[i]);
01610                                 }
01611                                 glEnd();
01612                                 
01613                                 glRotatef(-theta, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01614                             }                   
01615                             
01616                             if (pchan->ikflag & BONE_IK_XLIMIT) {
01617                                 /* OpenGL requires rotations in degrees; so we're taking the average angle here */
01618                                 theta = RAD2DEGF(0.5f * (pchan->limitmin[0] + pchan->limitmax[0]));
01619                                 glRotatef(theta, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01620                                 
01621                                 glColor3ub(255, 50, 50);    // Red, X axis limit
01622                                 glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
01623                                 for (a = -16; a <= 16; a++) {
01624                                     /* *0.5f here comes from M_PI/360.0f when rotations were still in degrees */
01625                                     float fac = ((float)a) / 16.0f * 0.5f;
01626                                     phi = (float)(0.5 * M_PI) + fac * (pchan->limitmax[0] - pchan->limitmin[0]);
01627                                     
01628                                     i = (a == -16) ? 2 : 3;
01629                                     corner[i][0] = 0.0f;
01630                                     corner[i][1] = (float)sin(phi);
01631                                     corner[i][2] = (float)cos(phi);
01632                                     glVertex3fv(corner[i]);
01633                                 }
01634                                 glEnd();
01635                                 
01636                                 glRotatef(-theta, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
01637                             }
01638                             
01639                             /* out of cone, out of bone */
01640                             glPopMatrix(); 
01641                         }
01642                     }
01643                 }
01644             }
01645         }
01646     }
01647 }
01648 
01649 static void bone_matrix_translate_y(float mat[][4], float y)
01650 {
01651     float trans[3];
01652 
01653     copy_v3_v3(trans, mat[1]);
01654     mul_v3_fl(trans, y);
01655     add_v3_v3(mat[3], trans);
01656 }
01657 
01658 /* assumes object is Armature with pose */
01659 static void draw_pose_bones(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar, Base *base, int dt,
01660                             const short is_ghost, const short is_outline)
01661 {
01662     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
01663     Object *ob = base->object;
01664     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
01665     bPoseChannel *pchan;
01666     Bone *bone;
01667     GLfloat tmp;
01668     float smat[4][4], imat[4][4], bmat[4][4];
01669     int index = -1;
01670     short do_dashed = 3, draw_wire = 0;
01671     int flag;
01672     
01673     /* being set below */
01674     arm->layer_used = 0;
01675     
01676     /* hacky... prevent outline select from drawing dashed helplines */
01677     glGetFloatv(GL_LINE_WIDTH, &tmp);
01678     if (tmp > 1.1f) do_dashed &= ~1;
01679     if (v3d->flag & V3D_HIDE_HELPLINES) do_dashed &= ~2;
01680     
01681     /* precalc inverse matrix for drawing screen aligned */
01682     if (arm->drawtype == ARM_ENVELOPE) {
01683         /* precalc inverse matrix for drawing screen aligned */
01684         copy_m4_m4(smat, rv3d->viewmatob);
01685         mul_mat3_m4_fl(smat, 1.0f / len_v3(ob->obmat[0]));
01686         invert_m4_m4(imat, smat);
01687         
01688         /* and draw blended distances */
01689         if (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE) {
01690             glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01691             //glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
01692             
01693             if (v3d->zbuf) glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01694             
01695             for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
01696                 bone = pchan->bone;
01697                 if (bone) {
01698                     /* 1) bone must be visible, 2) for OpenGL select-drawing cannot have unselectable [#27194] 
01699                      * NOTE: this is the only case with NO_DEFORM==0 flag, as this is for envelope influence drawing 
01700                      */
01701                     if ( (bone->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_P | BONE_NO_DEFORM | BONE_HIDDEN_PG)) == 0 &&
01702                          ((G.f & G_PICKSEL) == 0 || (bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) )
01703                     {
01704                         if (bone->flag & (BONE_SELECTED)) {
01705                             if (bone->layer & arm->layer)
01706                                 draw_sphere_bone_dist(smat, imat, pchan, NULL);
01707                         }
01708                     }
01709                 }
01710             }
01711             
01712             if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01713             glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01714             //glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
01715         }
01716     }
01717     
01718     /* little speedup, also make sure transparent only draws once */
01719     glCullFace(GL_BACK); 
01720     glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
01721     
01722     /* if solid we draw that first, with selection codes, but without names, axes etc */
01723     if (dt > OB_WIRE) {
01724         if (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE) 
01725             index = base->selcol;
01726         
01727         for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
01728             bone = pchan->bone;
01729             arm->layer_used |= bone->layer;
01730             
01731             /* 1) bone must be visible, 2) for OpenGL select-drawing cannot have unselectable [#27194] */
01732             if ( (bone->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_P | BONE_HIDDEN_PG)) == 0 &&
01733                  ((G.f & G_PICKSEL) == 0 || (bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) )
01734             {
01735                 if (bone->layer & arm->layer) {
01736                     int use_custom = (pchan->custom) && !(arm->flag & ARM_NO_CUSTOM);
01737                     glPushMatrix();
01738                     
01739                     if (use_custom && pchan->custom_tx) {
01740                         glMultMatrixf(pchan->custom_tx->pose_mat);
01741                     } 
01742                     else {
01743                         glMultMatrixf(pchan->pose_mat);
01744                     }
01745                     
01746                     /* catch exception for bone with hidden parent */
01747                     flag = bone->flag;
01748                     if ( (bone->parent) && (bone->parent->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_P | BONE_HIDDEN_PG)) )
01749                         flag &= ~BONE_CONNECTED;
01750                     
01751                     /* set temporary flag for drawing bone as active, but only if selected */
01752                     if (bone == arm->act_bone)
01753                         flag |= BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE;
01754                     
01755                     /* set color-set to use */
01756                     set_pchan_colorset(ob, pchan);
01757                     
01758                     if (use_custom) {
01759                         /* if drawwire, don't try to draw in solid */
01760                         if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_DRAWWIRE) {
01761                             draw_wire = 1;
01762                         }
01763                         else {
01764                             draw_custom_bone(scene, v3d, rv3d, pchan->custom,
01765                                              OB_SOLID, arm->flag, flag, index, bone->length);
01766                         }
01767                     }
01768                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_LINE) {
01769                         /* nothing in solid */
01770                     }
01771                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_WIRE) {
01772                         /* nothing in solid */
01773                     }
01774                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_ENVELOPE) {
01775                         draw_sphere_bone(OB_SOLID, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, pchan, NULL);
01776                     }
01777                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_B_BONE) {
01778                         draw_b_bone(OB_SOLID, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, pchan, NULL);
01779                     }
01780                     else {
01781                         draw_bone(OB_SOLID, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, bone->length);
01782                     }
01783                         
01784                     glPopMatrix();
01785                 }
01786             }
01787             
01788             if (index != -1)
01789                 index += 0x10000;   // pose bones count in higher 2 bytes only
01790         }
01791         
01792         /* very very confusing... but in object mode, solid draw, we cannot do glLoadName yet,
01793          * stick bones and/or wire custom-shapes are drawn in next loop 
01794          */
01795         if (ELEM(arm->drawtype, ARM_LINE, ARM_WIRE) == 0 && (draw_wire == 0)) {
01796             /* object tag, for bordersel optim */
01797             glLoadName(index & 0xFFFF); 
01798             index = -1;
01799         }
01800     }
01801     
01802     /* draw custom bone shapes as wireframes */
01803     if (!(arm->flag & ARM_NO_CUSTOM) &&
01804         ((draw_wire) || (dt <= OB_WIRE)) )
01805     {
01806         if (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE)
01807             index = base->selcol;
01808             
01809         /* only draw custom bone shapes that need to be drawn as wires */
01810         for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
01811             bone = pchan->bone;
01812             
01813             /* 1) bone must be visible, 2) for OpenGL select-drawing cannot have unselectable [#27194] */
01814             if ( (bone->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_P | BONE_HIDDEN_PG)) == 0 &&
01815                  ((G.f & G_PICKSEL) == 0 || (bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) )
01816             {
01817                 if (bone->layer & arm->layer) {
01818                     if (pchan->custom) {
01819                         if ((dt < OB_SOLID) || (bone->flag & BONE_DRAWWIRE)) {
01820                             glPushMatrix();
01821                             
01822                             if (pchan->custom_tx) {
01823                                 glMultMatrixf(pchan->custom_tx->pose_mat);
01824                             } 
01825                             else {
01826                                 glMultMatrixf(pchan->pose_mat);
01827                             }
01828                             
01829                             /* prepare colors */
01830                             if (is_ghost) {
01831                                 /* 13 October 2009, Disabled this to make ghosting show the right colors (Aligorith) */
01832                             }
01833                             else if (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE)  
01834                                 set_pchan_colorset(ob, pchan);
01835                             else {
01836                                 if ((scene->basact) == base) {
01837                                     if (base->flag & (SELECT + BA_WAS_SEL)) UI_ThemeColor(TH_ACTIVE);
01838                                     else UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);
01839                                 }
01840                                 else {
01841                                     if (base->flag & (SELECT + BA_WAS_SEL)) UI_ThemeColor(TH_SELECT);
01842                                     else UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);
01843                                 }
01844                             }
01845                                 
01846                             /* catch exception for bone with hidden parent */
01847                             flag = bone->flag;
01848                             if ((bone->parent) && (bone->parent->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_P | BONE_HIDDEN_PG)))
01849                                 flag &= ~BONE_CONNECTED;
01850                                 
01851                             /* set temporary flag for drawing bone as active, but only if selected */
01852                             if (bone == arm->act_bone)
01853                                 flag |= BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE;
01854                             
01855                             draw_custom_bone(scene, v3d, rv3d, pchan->custom,
01856                                              OB_WIRE, arm->flag, flag, index, bone->length);
01857                             
01858                             glPopMatrix();
01859                         }
01860                     }
01861                 }
01862             }
01863             
01864             if (index != -1) 
01865                 index += 0x10000;   // pose bones count in higher 2 bytes only
01866         }
01867         /* stick or wire bones have not been drawn yet so don't clear object selection in this case */
01868         if (ELEM(arm->drawtype, ARM_LINE, ARM_WIRE) == 0 && draw_wire) {
01869             /* object tag, for bordersel optim */
01870             glLoadName(index & 0xFFFF); 
01871             index = -1;
01872         }
01873     }
01874     
01875     /* wire draw over solid only in posemode */
01876     if ((dt <= OB_WIRE) || (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE) || ELEM(arm->drawtype, ARM_LINE, ARM_WIRE)) {
01877         /* draw line check first. we do selection indices */
01878         if (ELEM(arm->drawtype, ARM_LINE, ARM_WIRE)) {
01879             if (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE) 
01880                 index = base->selcol;
01881         }
01882         /* if solid && posemode, we draw again with polygonoffset */
01883         else if ((dt > OB_WIRE) && (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE)) {
01884             bglPolygonOffset(rv3d->dist, 1.0);
01885         }
01886         else {
01887             /* and we use selection indices if not done yet */
01888             if (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE) 
01889                 index = base->selcol;
01890         }
01891         
01892         for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
01893             bone = pchan->bone;
01894             arm->layer_used |= bone->layer;
01895             
01896             /* 1) bone must be visible, 2) for OpenGL select-drawing cannot have unselectable [#27194] */
01897             if ( (bone->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_P | BONE_HIDDEN_PG)) == 0 &&
01898                  ((G.f & G_PICKSEL) == 0 || (bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE) == 0) )
01899             {
01900                 if (bone->layer & arm->layer) {
01901                     const short constflag = pchan->constflag;
01902                     if ((do_dashed & 1) && (pchan->parent)) {
01903                         /* Draw a line from our root to the parent's tip 
01904                          *  - only if V3D_HIDE_HELPLINES is enabled...
01905                          */
01906                         if ( (do_dashed & 2) && ((bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) == 0) ) {
01907                             if (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE) {
01908                                 glLoadName(index & 0xFFFF); // object tag, for bordersel optim
01909                                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);
01910                             }
01911                             setlinestyle(3);
01912                             glBegin(GL_LINES);
01913                             glVertex3fv(pchan->pose_head);
01914                             glVertex3fv(pchan->parent->pose_tail);
01915                             glEnd();
01916                             setlinestyle(0);
01917                         }
01918                         
01919                         /* Draw a line to IK root bone 
01920                          *  - only if temporary chain (i.e. "autoik")
01921                          */
01922                         if (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE) {
01923                             if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_IK) {
01924                                 if (bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
01925                                     if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_TARGET) glColor3ub(200, 120, 0);
01926                                     else glColor3ub(200, 200, 50);  // add theme!
01927                                     
01928                                     glLoadName(index & 0xFFFF);
01929                                     pchan_draw_IK_root_lines(pchan, !(do_dashed & 2));
01930                                 }
01931                             }
01932                             else if (constflag & PCHAN_HAS_SPLINEIK) {
01933                                 if (bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
01934                                     glColor3ub(150, 200, 50);   // add theme!
01935                                     
01936                                     glLoadName(index & 0xFFFF);
01937                                     pchan_draw_IK_root_lines(pchan, !(do_dashed & 2));
01938                                 }
01939                             }   
01940                         }
01941                     }
01942                     
01943                     glPushMatrix();
01944                     if (arm->drawtype != ARM_ENVELOPE)
01945                         glMultMatrixf(pchan->pose_mat);
01946                     
01947                     /* catch exception for bone with hidden parent */
01948                     flag = bone->flag;
01949                     if ((bone->parent) && (bone->parent->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_P | BONE_HIDDEN_PG)))
01950                         flag &= ~BONE_CONNECTED;
01951                     
01952                     /* set temporary flag for drawing bone as active, but only if selected */
01953                     if (bone == arm->act_bone)
01954                         flag |= BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE;
01955                     
01956                     /* extra draw service for pose mode */
01957 
01958                     /* set color-set to use */
01959                     set_pchan_colorset(ob, pchan);
01960                     
01961                     if ((pchan->custom) && !(arm->flag & ARM_NO_CUSTOM)) {
01962                         /* custom bone shapes should not be drawn here! */
01963                     }
01964                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_ENVELOPE) {
01965                         if (dt < OB_SOLID)
01966                             draw_sphere_bone_wire(smat, imat, arm->flag, flag, constflag, index, pchan, NULL);
01967                     }
01968                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_LINE)
01969                         draw_line_bone(arm->flag, flag, constflag, index, pchan, NULL);
01970                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_WIRE)
01971                         draw_wire_bone(dt, arm->flag, flag, constflag, index, pchan, NULL);
01972                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_B_BONE)
01973                         draw_b_bone(OB_WIRE, arm->flag, flag, constflag, index, pchan, NULL);
01974                     else
01975                         draw_bone(OB_WIRE, arm->flag, flag, constflag, index, bone->length);
01976                     
01977                     glPopMatrix();
01978                 }
01979             }
01980             
01981             /* pose bones count in higher 2 bytes only */
01982             if (index != -1) 
01983                 index += 0x10000;
01984         }
01985         /* restore things */
01986         if (!ELEM(arm->drawtype, ARM_WIRE, ARM_LINE) && (dt > OB_WIRE) && (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE))
01987             bglPolygonOffset(rv3d->dist, 0.0);
01988     }   
01989     
01990     /* restore */
01991     glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);
01992     
01993     /* draw DoFs */
01994     if (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE)
01995         draw_pose_dofs(ob);
01996 
01997     /* finally names and axes */
01998     if ((arm->flag & (ARM_DRAWNAMES | ARM_DRAWAXES)) && (is_outline == 0)) {
01999         /* patch for several 3d cards (IBM mostly) that crash on glSelect with text drawing */
02000         if ((G.f & G_PICKSEL) == 0) {
02001             float vec[3];
02002             
02003             unsigned char col[4];
02004             float col_f[4];
02005             glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_COLOR, col_f); /* in case this is not set below */
02006             rgb_float_to_uchar(col, col_f);
02007             col[3] = 255;
02008             
02009             if (v3d->zbuf) glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02010             
02011             for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
02012                 if ((pchan->bone->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_P | BONE_HIDDEN_PG)) == 0) {
02013                     if (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer) {
02014                         if (arm->flag & (ARM_EDITMODE | ARM_POSEMODE)) {
02015                             bone = pchan->bone;
02016                             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv((bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) ? TH_TEXT_HI : TH_TEXT, col);
02017                         }
02018                         else if (dt > OB_WIRE) {
02019                             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_TEXT, col);
02020                         }
02021                         
02022                         /*  Draw names of bone  */
02023                         if (arm->flag & ARM_DRAWNAMES) {
02024                             mid_v3_v3v3(vec, pchan->pose_head, pchan->pose_tail);
02025                             view3d_cached_text_draw_add(vec, pchan->name, 10, 0, col);
02026                         }   
02027                         
02028                         /*  Draw additional axes on the bone tail  */
02029                         if ( (arm->flag & ARM_DRAWAXES) && (arm->flag & ARM_POSEMODE) ) {
02030                             glPushMatrix();
02031                             copy_m4_m4(bmat, pchan->pose_mat);
02032                             bone_matrix_translate_y(bmat, pchan->bone->length);
02033                             glMultMatrixf(bmat);
02034                             
02035                             glColor3ubv(col);
02036                             drawaxes(pchan->bone->length * 0.25f, OB_ARROWS);
02037                             
02038                             glPopMatrix();
02039                         }
02040                     }
02041                 }
02042             }
02043             
02044             if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02045         }
02046     }
02047 }
02048
