02049 /* in editmode, we don't store the bone matrix... */
02050 static void get_matrix_editbone(EditBone *eBone, float bmat[][4])
02051 {
02052     float delta[3];
02053     float mat[3][3];
02054     
02055     /* Compose the parent transforms (i.e. their translations) */
02056     sub_v3_v3v3(delta, eBone->tail, eBone->head);   
02057     
02058     eBone->length = (float)sqrt(delta[0] * delta[0] + delta[1] * delta[1] + delta[2] * delta[2]);
02059     
02060     vec_roll_to_mat3(delta, eBone->roll, mat);
02061     copy_m4_m3(bmat, mat);
02062 
02063     add_v3_v3(bmat[3], eBone->head);
02064 }
02065 
02066 static void draw_ebones(View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar, Object *ob, int dt)
02067 {
02068     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
02069     EditBone *eBone;
02070     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
02071     float smat[4][4], imat[4][4], bmat[4][4];
02072     unsigned int index;
02073     int flag;
02074     
02075     /* being set in code below */
02076     arm->layer_used = 0;
02077     
02078     /* envelope (deform distance) */
02079     if (arm->drawtype == ARM_ENVELOPE) {
02080         /* precalc inverse matrix for drawing screen aligned */
02081         copy_m4_m4(smat, rv3d->viewmatob);
02082         mul_mat3_m4_fl(smat, 1.0f / len_v3(ob->obmat[0]));
02083         invert_m4_m4(imat, smat);
02084         
02085         /* and draw blended distances */
02086         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02087         //glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
02088         
02089         if (v3d->zbuf) glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02090 
02091         for (eBone = arm->edbo->first; eBone; eBone = eBone->next) {
02092             if (eBone->layer & arm->layer) {
02093                 if ((eBone->flag & (BONE_HIDDEN_A | BONE_NO_DEFORM)) == 0) {
02094                     if (eBone->flag & (BONE_SELECTED | BONE_TIPSEL | BONE_ROOTSEL))
02095                         draw_sphere_bone_dist(smat, imat, NULL, eBone);
02096                 }
02097             }
02098         }
02099         
02100         if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02101         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02102         //glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
02103     }
02104     
02105     /* if solid we draw it first */
02106     if ((dt > OB_WIRE) && (arm->drawtype != ARM_LINE)) {
02107         for (eBone = arm->edbo->first, index = 0; eBone; eBone = eBone->next, index++) {
02108             if (eBone->layer & arm->layer) {
02109                 if ((eBone->flag & BONE_HIDDEN_A) == 0) {
02110                     glPushMatrix();
02111                     get_matrix_editbone(eBone, bmat);
02112                     glMultMatrixf(bmat);
02113                     
02114                     /* catch exception for bone with hidden parent */
02115                     flag = eBone->flag;
02116                     if ( (eBone->parent) && !EBONE_VISIBLE(arm, eBone->parent))
02117                         flag &= ~BONE_CONNECTED;
02118                         
02119                     /* set temporary flag for drawing bone as active, but only if selected */
02120                     if (eBone == arm->act_edbone)
02121                         flag |= BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE;
02122                     
02123                     if (arm->drawtype == ARM_ENVELOPE)
02124                         draw_sphere_bone(OB_SOLID, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, NULL, eBone);
02125                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_B_BONE)
02126                         draw_b_bone(OB_SOLID, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, NULL, eBone);
02127                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_WIRE)
02128                         draw_wire_bone(OB_SOLID, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, NULL, eBone);
02129                     else {
02130                         draw_bone(OB_SOLID, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, eBone->length);
02131                     }
02132                     
02133                     glPopMatrix();
02134                 }
02135             }
02136         }
02137     }
02138     
02139     /* if wire over solid, set offset */
02140     index = -1;
02141     glLoadName(-1);
02142     if (ELEM(arm->drawtype, ARM_LINE, ARM_WIRE)) {
02143         if (G.f & G_PICKSEL)
02144             index = 0;
02145     }
02146     else if (dt > OB_WIRE) 
02147         bglPolygonOffset(rv3d->dist, 1.0f);
02148     else if (arm->flag & ARM_EDITMODE) 
02149         index = 0;  /* do selection codes */
02150     
02151     for (eBone = arm->edbo->first; eBone; eBone = eBone->next) {
02152         arm->layer_used |= eBone->layer;
02153         if (eBone->layer & arm->layer) {
02154             if ((eBone->flag & BONE_HIDDEN_A) == 0) {
02155                 
02156                 /* catch exception for bone with hidden parent */
02157                 flag = eBone->flag;
02158                 if ( (eBone->parent) && !EBONE_VISIBLE(arm, eBone->parent))
02159                     flag &= ~BONE_CONNECTED;
02160                     
02161                 /* set temporary flag for drawing bone as active, but only if selected */
02162                 if (eBone == arm->act_edbone)
02163                     flag |= BONE_DRAW_ACTIVE;
02164                 
02165                 if (arm->drawtype == ARM_ENVELOPE) {
02166                     if (dt < OB_SOLID)
02167                         draw_sphere_bone_wire(smat, imat, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, NULL, eBone);
02168                 }
02169                 else {
02170                     glPushMatrix();
02171                     get_matrix_editbone(eBone, bmat);
02172                     glMultMatrixf(bmat);
02173                     
02174                     if (arm->drawtype == ARM_LINE) 
02175                         draw_line_bone(arm->flag, flag, 0, index, NULL, eBone);
02176                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_WIRE)
02177                         draw_wire_bone(OB_WIRE, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, NULL, eBone);
02178                     else if (arm->drawtype == ARM_B_BONE)
02179                         draw_b_bone(OB_WIRE, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, NULL, eBone);
02180                     else
02181                         draw_bone(OB_WIRE, arm->flag, flag, 0, index, eBone->length);
02182                     
02183                     glPopMatrix();
02184                 }
02185                 
02186                 /* offset to parent */
02187                 if (eBone->parent) {
02188                     UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);
02189                     glLoadName(-1);         // -1 here is OK!
02190                     setlinestyle(3);
02191                     
02192                     glBegin(GL_LINES);
02193                     glVertex3fv(eBone->parent->tail);
02194                     glVertex3fv(eBone->head);
02195                     glEnd();
02196                     
02197                     setlinestyle(0);
02198                 }
02199             }
02200         }
02201         if (index != -1) index++;
02202     }
02203     
02204     /* restore */
02205     if (index != -1) glLoadName(-1);
02206     if (ELEM(arm->drawtype, ARM_LINE, ARM_WIRE)) ;
02207     else if (dt > OB_WIRE) bglPolygonOffset(rv3d->dist, 0.0f);
02208     
02209     /* finally names and axes */
02210     if (arm->flag & (ARM_DRAWNAMES | ARM_DRAWAXES)) {
02211         // patch for several 3d cards (IBM mostly) that crash on glSelect with text drawing
02212         if ((G.f & G_PICKSEL) == 0) {
02213             float vec[3];
02214             unsigned char col[4];
02215             col[3] = 255;
02216             
02217             if (v3d->zbuf) glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02218             
02219             for (eBone = arm->edbo->first; eBone; eBone = eBone->next) {
02220                 if (eBone->layer & arm->layer) {
02221                     if ((eBone->flag & BONE_HIDDEN_A) == 0) {
02222 
02223                         UI_GetThemeColor3ubv((eBone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) ? TH_TEXT_HI : TH_TEXT, col);
02224 
02225                         /*  Draw name */
02226                         if (arm->flag & ARM_DRAWNAMES) {
02227                             mid_v3_v3v3(vec, eBone->head, eBone->tail);
02228                             glRasterPos3fv(vec);
02229                             view3d_cached_text_draw_add(vec, eBone->name, 10, 0, col);
02230                         }                   
02231                         /*  Draw additional axes */
02232                         if (arm->flag & ARM_DRAWAXES) {
02233                             glPushMatrix();
02234                             get_matrix_editbone(eBone, bmat);
02235                             bone_matrix_translate_y(bmat, eBone->length);
02236                             glMultMatrixf(bmat);
02237 
02238                             glColor3ubv(col);
02239                             drawaxes(eBone->length * 0.25f, OB_ARROWS);
02240                             
02241                             glPopMatrix();
02242                         }
02243                         
02244                     }
02245                 }
02246             }
02247             
02248             if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02249         }
02250     }
02251 }
02252 
02253 /* ****************************** Armature Visualisation ******************************** */
02254 
02255 /* ---------- Paths --------- */
02256 
02257 /* draw bone paths
02258  *  - in view space 
02259  */
02260 static void draw_pose_paths(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar, Object *ob)
02261 {
02262     bAnimVizSettings *avs = &ob->pose->avs;
02263     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
02264     bPoseChannel *pchan;
02265     
02266     /* setup drawing environment for paths */
02267     draw_motion_paths_init(v3d, ar);
02268     
02269     /* draw paths where they exist and they releated bone is visible */
02270     for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
02271         if ((pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer) && (pchan->mpath))
02272             draw_motion_path_instance(scene, ob, pchan, avs, pchan->mpath);
02273     }
02274     
02275     /* cleanup after drawing */
02276     draw_motion_paths_cleanup(v3d);
02277 }
02278 
02279 
02280 /* ---------- Ghosts --------- */
02281 
02282 /* helper function for ghost drawing - sets/removes flags for temporarily 
02283  * hiding unselected bones while drawing ghosts
02284  */
02285 static void ghost_poses_tag_unselected(Object *ob, short unset)
02286 {
02287     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
02288     bPose *pose = ob->pose;
02289     bPoseChannel *pchan;
02290     
02291     /* don't do anything if no hiding any bones */
02292     if ((arm->flag & ARM_GHOST_ONLYSEL) == 0)
02293         return;
02294         
02295     /* loop over all pchans, adding/removing tags as appropriate */
02296     for (pchan = pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
02297         if ((pchan->bone) && (arm->layer & pchan->bone->layer)) {
02298             if (unset) {
02299                 /* remove tags from all pchans if cleaning up */
02300                 pchan->bone->flag &= ~BONE_HIDDEN_PG;
02301             }
02302             else {
02303                 /* set tags on unselected pchans only */
02304                 if ((pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) == 0)
02305                     pchan->bone->flag |= BONE_HIDDEN_PG;
02306             }
02307         }
02308     }
02309 }
02310 
02311 /* draw ghosts that occur within a frame range 
02312  *  note: object should be in posemode
02313  */
02314 static void draw_ghost_poses_range(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar, Base *base)
02315 {
02316     Object *ob = base->object;
02317     AnimData *adt = BKE_animdata_from_id(&ob->id);
02318     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
02319     bPose *posen, *poseo;
02320     float start, end, stepsize, range, colfac;
02321     int cfrao, flago, ipoflago;
02322     
02323     start = (float)arm->ghostsf;
02324     end = (float)arm->ghostef;
02325     if (end <= start)
02326         return;
02327     
02328     stepsize = (float)(arm->ghostsize);
02329     range = (float)(end - start);
02330     
02331     /* store values */
02332     ob->mode &= ~OB_MODE_POSE;
02333     cfrao = CFRA;
02334     flago = arm->flag;
02335     arm->flag &= ~(ARM_DRAWNAMES | ARM_DRAWAXES);
02336     ipoflago = ob->ipoflag;
02337     ob->ipoflag |= OB_DISABLE_PATH;
02338     
02339     /* copy the pose */
02340     poseo = ob->pose;
02341     copy_pose(&posen, ob->pose, 1);
02342     ob->pose = posen;
02343     armature_rebuild_pose(ob, ob->data);    /* child pointers for IK */
02344     ghost_poses_tag_unselected(ob, 0);      /* hide unselected bones if need be */
02345     
02346     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02347     if (v3d->zbuf) glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02348     
02349     /* draw from first frame of range to last */
02350     for (CFRA = (int)start; CFRA < end; CFRA += (int)stepsize) {
02351         colfac = (end - (float)CFRA) / range;
02352         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_WIRE, 0, -128 - (int)(120.0 * sqrt(colfac)));
02353         
02354         BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, &ob->id, adt, (float)CFRA, ADT_RECALC_ALL);
02355         where_is_pose(scene, ob);
02356         draw_pose_bones(scene, v3d, ar, base, OB_WIRE, TRUE, FALSE);
02357     }
02358     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02359     if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02360 
02361     ghost_poses_tag_unselected(ob, 1);      /* unhide unselected bones if need be */
02362     free_pose(posen);
02363     
02364     /* restore */
02365     CFRA = cfrao;
02366     ob->pose = poseo;
02367     arm->flag = flago;
02368     armature_rebuild_pose(ob, ob->data);
02369     ob->mode |= OB_MODE_POSE;
02370     ob->ipoflag = ipoflago;
02371 }
02372 
02373 /* draw ghosts on keyframes in action within range 
02374  *  - object should be in posemode 
02375  */
02376 static void draw_ghost_poses_keys(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar, Base *base)
02377 {
02378     Object *ob = base->object;
02379     AnimData *adt = BKE_animdata_from_id(&ob->id);
02380     bAction *act = (adt) ? adt->action : NULL;
02381     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
02382     bPose *posen, *poseo;
02383     DLRBT_Tree keys;
02384     ActKeyColumn *ak, *akn;
02385     float start, end, range, colfac, i;
02386     int cfrao, flago;
02387     
02388     start = (float)arm->ghostsf;
02389     end = (float)arm->ghostef;
02390     if (end <= start)
02391         return;
02392     
02393     /* get keyframes - then clip to only within range */
02394     BLI_dlrbTree_init(&keys);
02395     action_to_keylist(adt, act, &keys, NULL);
02396     BLI_dlrbTree_linkedlist_sync(&keys);
02397     
02398     range = 0;
02399     for (ak = keys.first; ak; ak = akn) {
02400         akn = ak->next;
02401         
02402         if ((ak->cfra < start) || (ak->cfra > end))
02403             BLI_freelinkN((ListBase *)&keys, ak);
02404         else
02405             range++;
02406     }
02407     if (range == 0) return;
02408     
02409     /* store values */
02410     ob->mode &= ~OB_MODE_POSE;
02411     cfrao = CFRA;
02412     flago = arm->flag;
02413     arm->flag &= ~(ARM_DRAWNAMES | ARM_DRAWAXES);
02414     ob->ipoflag |= OB_DISABLE_PATH;
02415     
02416     /* copy the pose */
02417     poseo = ob->pose;
02418     copy_pose(&posen, ob->pose, 1);
02419     ob->pose = posen;
02420     armature_rebuild_pose(ob, ob->data);  /* child pointers for IK */
02421     ghost_poses_tag_unselected(ob, 0);    /* hide unselected bones if need be */
02422     
02423     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02424     if (v3d->zbuf) glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02425     
02426     /* draw from first frame of range to last */
02427     for (ak = keys.first, i = 0; ak; ak = ak->next, i++) {
02428         colfac = i / range;
02429         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_WIRE, 0, -128 - (int)(120.0 * sqrt(colfac)));
02430         
02431         CFRA = (int)ak->cfra;
02432         
02433         BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, &ob->id, adt, (float)CFRA, ADT_RECALC_ALL);
02434         where_is_pose(scene, ob);
02435         draw_pose_bones(scene, v3d, ar, base, OB_WIRE, TRUE, FALSE);
02436     }
02437     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02438     if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02439 
02440     ghost_poses_tag_unselected(ob, 1);  /* unhide unselected bones if need be */
02441     BLI_dlrbTree_free(&keys);
02442     free_pose(posen);
02443     
02444     /* restore */
02445     CFRA = cfrao;
02446     ob->pose = poseo;
02447     arm->flag = flago;
02448     armature_rebuild_pose(ob, ob->data);
02449     ob->mode |= OB_MODE_POSE;
02450 }
02451 
02452 /* draw ghosts around current frame
02453  *  - object is supposed to be armature in posemode
02454  */
02455 static void draw_ghost_poses(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar, Base *base)
02456 {
02457     Object *ob = base->object;
02458     AnimData *adt = BKE_animdata_from_id(&ob->id);
02459     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
02460     bPose *posen, *poseo;
02461     float cur, start, end, stepsize, range, colfac, actframe, ctime;
02462     int cfrao, flago;
02463     
02464     /* pre conditions, get an action with sufficient frames */
02465     if (ELEM(NULL, adt, adt->action))
02466         return;
02467 
02468     calc_action_range(adt->action, &start, &end, 0);
02469     if (start == end)
02470         return;
02471 
02472     stepsize = (float)(arm->ghostsize);
02473     range = (float)(arm->ghostep) * stepsize + 0.5f;   /* plus half to make the for loop end correct */
02474     
02475     /* store values */
02476     ob->mode &= ~OB_MODE_POSE;
02477     cfrao = CFRA;
02478     actframe = BKE_nla_tweakedit_remap(adt, (float)CFRA, 0);
02479     flago = arm->flag;
02480     arm->flag &= ~(ARM_DRAWNAMES | ARM_DRAWAXES);
02481     
02482     /* copy the pose */
02483     poseo = ob->pose;
02484     copy_pose(&posen, ob->pose, 1);
02485     ob->pose = posen;
02486     armature_rebuild_pose(ob, ob->data);    /* child pointers for IK */
02487     ghost_poses_tag_unselected(ob, 0);      /* hide unselected bones if need be */
02488     
02489     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02490     if (v3d->zbuf) glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02491     
02492     /* draw from darkest blend to lowest */
02493     for (cur = stepsize; cur < range; cur += stepsize) {
02494         ctime = cur - (float)fmod(cfrao, stepsize);  /* ensures consistent stepping */
02495         colfac = ctime / range;
02496         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_WIRE, 0, -128 - (int)(120.0 * sqrt(colfac)));
02497         
02498         /* only within action range */
02499         if (actframe + ctime >= start && actframe + ctime <= end) {
02500             CFRA = (int)BKE_nla_tweakedit_remap(adt, actframe + ctime, NLATIME_CONVERT_MAP);
02501             
02502             if (CFRA != cfrao) {
02503                 BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, &ob->id, adt, (float)CFRA, ADT_RECALC_ALL);
02504                 where_is_pose(scene, ob);
02505                 draw_pose_bones(scene, v3d, ar, base, OB_WIRE, TRUE, FALSE);
02506             }
02507         }
02508         
02509         ctime = cur + (float)fmod((float)cfrao, stepsize) - stepsize + 1.0f;   /* ensures consistent stepping */
02510         colfac = ctime / range;
02511         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_WIRE, 0, -128 - (int)(120.0 * sqrt(colfac)));
02512         
02513         /* only within action range */
02514         if ((actframe - ctime >= start) && (actframe - ctime <= end)) {
02515             CFRA = (int)BKE_nla_tweakedit_remap(adt, actframe - ctime, NLATIME_CONVERT_MAP);
02516             
02517             if (CFRA != cfrao) {
02518                 BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, &ob->id, adt, (float)CFRA, ADT_RECALC_ALL);
02519                 where_is_pose(scene, ob);
02520                 draw_pose_bones(scene, v3d, ar, base, OB_WIRE, TRUE, FALSE);
02521             }
02522         }
02523     }
02524     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02525     if (v3d->zbuf) glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
02526 
02527     ghost_poses_tag_unselected(ob, 1);      /* unhide unselected bones if need be */
02528     free_pose(posen);
02529     
02530     /* restore */
02531     CFRA = cfrao;
02532     ob->pose = poseo;
02533     arm->flag = flago;
02534     armature_rebuild_pose(ob, ob->data);
02535     ob->mode |= OB_MODE_POSE;
02536 }
02537 
02538 /* ********************************** Armature Drawing - Main ************************* */
02539 
02540 /* called from drawobject.c, return 1 if nothing was drawn */
02541 int draw_armature(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar, Base *base, int dt, int flag, const short is_outline)
02542 {
02543     Object *ob = base->object;
02544     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
02545     int retval = 0;
02546 
02547     if (v3d->flag2 & V3D_RENDER_OVERRIDE)
02548         return 1;
02549     
02550     if (dt > OB_WIRE && !ELEM(arm->drawtype, ARM_LINE, ARM_WIRE)) {
02551         /* we use color for solid lighting */
02552         glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_SPECULAR);
02553         glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
02554         glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);    // clear spec
02555         glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
02556         
02557         glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_DIFFUSE);
02558         glFrontFace((ob->transflag & OB_NEG_SCALE) ? GL_CW : GL_CCW); // only for lighting...
02559     }
02560     
02561     /* arm->flag is being used to detect mode... */
02562     /* editmode? */
02563     if (arm->edbo) {
02564         arm->flag |= ARM_EDITMODE;
02565         draw_ebones(v3d, ar, ob, dt);
02566         arm->flag &= ~ARM_EDITMODE;
02567     }
02568     else {
02569         /*  Draw Pose */
02570         if (ob->pose && ob->pose->chanbase.first) {
02571             /* drawing posemode selection indices or colors only in these cases */
02572             if (!(base->flag & OB_FROMDUPLI)) {
02573                 if (G.f & G_PICKSEL) {
02574 #if 0
02575                     /* nifty but actually confusing to allow bone selection out of posemode */
02576                     if (OBACT && (OBACT->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT)) {
02577                         if (ob == modifiers_isDeformedByArmature(OBACT))
02578                             arm->flag |= ARM_POSEMODE;
02579                     }
02580                     else
02581 #endif
02582                     if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
02583                         arm->flag |= ARM_POSEMODE;
02584                     }
02585                 }
02586                 else if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
02587                     if (arm->ghosttype == ARM_GHOST_RANGE) {
02588                         draw_ghost_poses_range(scene, v3d, ar, base);
02589                     }
02590                     else if (arm->ghosttype == ARM_GHOST_KEYS) {
02591                         draw_ghost_poses_keys(scene, v3d, ar, base);
02592                     }
02593                     else if (arm->ghosttype == ARM_GHOST_CUR) {
02594                         if (arm->ghostep)
02595                             draw_ghost_poses(scene, v3d, ar, base);
02596                     }
02597                     if ((flag & DRAW_SCENESET) == 0) {
02598                         if (ob == OBACT)
02599                             arm->flag |= ARM_POSEMODE;
02600                         else if (OBACT && (OBACT->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT)) {
02601                             if (ob == modifiers_isDeformedByArmature(OBACT))
02602                                 arm->flag |= ARM_POSEMODE;
02603                         }
02604                         draw_pose_paths(scene, v3d, ar, ob);
02605                     }
02606                 }   
02607             }
02608             draw_pose_bones(scene, v3d, ar, base, dt, FALSE, is_outline);
02609             arm->flag &= ~ARM_POSEMODE; 
02610             
02611             if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)
02612                 UI_ThemeColor(TH_WIRE);  /* restore, for extra draw stuff */
02613         }
02614         else {
02615             retval = 1;
02616         }
02617     }
02618     /* restore */
02619     glFrontFace(GL_CCW);
02620 
02621     return retval;
02622 }
